TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed UnitType extends System.Enum

remarks.format:
## Remarks The UnitType enumeration represents the different supported measurement units. Measurements can be represented in pixels, points, picas, inches, millimeters, centimeters, percentages, em, or ex.
A Point is a unit of measurement that represents 1/72 of an inch.
A Pica is a unit that equals 12 points.
A Percentage is a unit of measurement that is relative to a parent element. For example, if the font size of a paragraph is 10 pixels, you can place a phrase inside the paragraph with a font size specified as 200%. The font size of the phrase becomes twice the font size of the paragraph, or 20 pixels.
An Em is a unit of measurement that is relative to the height of a parent element's font. For example, if the font size of a paragraph is 10 pixels, you can place a phrase inside the paragraph with a font size specified as 2 em. The font size of the phrase becomes twice the font size of the paragraph, or 20 pixels.
An Ex is a unit of measurement that is relative to the height of the lowercase letter x of the parent element's font. For example if the font size of a paragraph is 10 pixels, you can place a phrase inside the paragraph with a font size specified as 2 ex. The font size of the phrase becomes twice the font size of a lowercase letter x in the paragraph.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType Cm = int32(6)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType Em = int32(8)

Docs.summary: Measurement is relative to the height of the parent element's font.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType Ex = int32(9)

Docs.summary: Measurement is relative to the height of the lowercase letter x of the parent element's font.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType Inch = int32(4)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType Mm = int32(5)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType Percentage = int32(7)

Docs.summary: Measurement is a percentage relative to the parent element.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType Pica = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Measurement is in picas. A pica represents 12 points.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType Pixel = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.UnitType Point = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Measurement is in points. A point represents 1/72 of an inch.
